name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
description: A comfortable and versatile 100% cotton t-shirt, perfect for everyday wear. Available in multiple colors.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-fidelity wireless headphones with noise-cancellation and a 20-hour battery life. Includes a carrying case.

name: Leatherbound Journal
description: Elegant A5 leatherbound journal with 200 lined pages. Ideal for notes, sketches, or diary entries.

name: Gourmet Coffee Beans
description: 12oz bag of whole bean Arabica coffee, medium roast, with notes of chocolate and caramel. Sourced sustainably.

name: Modern Desk Lamp
description: Sleek LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. USB charging port included.
